meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 22, 2024, Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: 2024 External Audit Planning Meeting
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the planning for the external audit for 2024.

agenda_items.title: Update on Short-Term Rentals (STR)
agenda_items.description: Includes numbers of active STRs, hotel occupancy tax collections, and costs for city STR oversight.

agenda_items.title: Report of the Independent Auditor of the City of Dallas Police and Fire pension System
agenda_items.description: Report as required by Texas Government Code Section 802.1012.

agenda_items.title: Report on Progress of Family Gateway Property Repairs
agenda_items.description: Update on the repairs as of October 2024.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Budget Accountability Report
agenda_items.description: Report on the budget accountability for the month.

agenda_items.title: Ratification Agenda Items for November 13, 2024, City Council Meeting
agenda_items.description: Items related to HVAC parts, digital content resources for the library.

agenda_items.title: Proposing Appropriations for Memberships in Organizations
Proposing Amendment of Chapter 2-11.2 of the Dallas City Code
agenda_items.description: Increase the threshold of administrative real property acquisitions.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the FY 2024-25 Community Survey
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the community survey methodology and timeline.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Authorizing Insurance
agenda_items.description: Discussion on upcoming agenda items related to bonds.
